content: if you like this pattern you ll probably like my cozy knitting newsletter https //dashboard mailerlite com/forms/936047/120780277461025946/share too subscribers get early access to test knits exclusive discounts and news from around the knittingverse **pattern notes** do you ever finish a pair of socks and find yourself with a small amount of leftover yarn do you like quick projects that are both beautiful and useful then this is the pattern for you what do you do with leftover sock yarn make sock hands of course sock hands are knit in the round from the cuff up then knit flat to create a thumb hole before rejoining in the round to finish they re highly customizable and you can make any part of them larger or smaller they re also quite stretchy i find the very simple style of thumb hole used here to be the easiest to wear when typing or knitting and i wear one of my many pairs of sock hands almost every day between november and march
